price: Àyàfi ẹni tí ó bá dé ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu pẹ̀lú ọkàn mímọ́.”¹
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلۡبٖ سَلِيمٖ
footnotes: 1. Ọkàn mímọ́ ni ọkàn tí ó là kúrò nínú ẹbọ ṣíṣe, àìgbàgbọ́ àti ìṣọ̀bẹ-ṣèlu nínú ẹ̀sìn.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: illā man atā al-laha biqalbin salīmin
